comment: "Did not ask rate before publication (glad to have the opinion published, paid or unpaid, although I expected there would be payment.) Inquired after and was told $150. Paid promptly, after filling out paperwork."

"We submitted the op-ed about 10 days ahead of our target publication date; heard back within 2 days; had some back and forth to address the editor's concerns; spent a little time in limbo as to exact run date and length. In the end, the piece ran at its original length, over 1,000, words, long for an op-ed. We got paid right away. Very positive experience."
relationship: Submission/spec (piece was written prior and then submitted for publication)
Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication
